summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5406 for the improvement of Ferdinand Street, from 24th Avenue South to 28th Avenue South; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 67371, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
